abstract: A method for receiving a plurality of types of data within a cognitive information processing system environment comprising: receiving data from a plurality of data sources, the plurality of data sources comprising a public data source and a private data source the public source comprising a public blockchain data source, the private data source comprising a private blockchain data source; accessing information from the plurality of data sources via a cognitive data management module, the information comprising public blockchain information and private blockchain information; and, providing the information to an inference and learning system.
summary: <SOH> SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION <EOH>In one embodiment, the invention relates to a method for receiving a plurality of types of data within a cognitive information processing system environment comprising: receiving data from a plurality of data sources, the plurality of data sources comprising a public data source and a private data source the public source comprising a public blockchain data source, the private data source comprising a private blockchain data source; accessing information from the plurality of data sources via a cognitive data management module; and, providing the information to an inference and learning system.
title: Method for Using Hybrid Blockchain Data Architecture Within a Cognitive Environment
